channel.title: Rabbit Hole Cycle
channel.description: Welcome to the Rabbit Hole Cycle podcast! This is a podcast where we dive into the Wikipedia rabbit hole together. My name is Donovan, and much like Marie Kondo, I love mess, and that's why I'll be leading you into the ridiculousness of trending topics on Wikipedia every week! In this first season, I'll be focusing mostly on the 2020 election in the United States.
channel.copyright: Copyright (C) 2020 Donovan Richardson, except where noted.
channel.itunes:author: Donovan Richardson
